price: ចូរអ្នក(អៃយ៉ូប)ទន្ទ្រាំជើងរបស់អ្នក(ពេលនោះមានទឹក ផុសចេញពីដី)។ នេះគឺជាទឹកត្រជាក់សម្រាប់ងូតនិងផឹក។
arabic: ٱرۡكُضۡ بِرِجۡلِكَۖ هَٰذَا مُغۡتَسَلُۢ بَارِدٞ وَشَرَابٞ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: ur'kuḍ birij'lika hādhā mugh'tasalun bāridun washarābun
translations: (is a spring of) water to bathe
